ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.33"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF-238)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF-239)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF-240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF-241, CONF-242)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF-246)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Social History Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF-249)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Episode Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.41)

The value for Observation / code in a social history observation SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), or MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.18 SocialHistoryTypeCode STATIC 20061017 (CONF-243)

Observation / value can be any datatype. Where Observation / value is a physical quantity, the unit of measure SHALL be expressed using a valid Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) expression (CONF-244)
SHALL satisfy: Contains one or more sources of information (CONF-245)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF-238)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF-239)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF-240)
Contains exactly one [1..1] code with data type CD
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF-241, CONF-242)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF-246)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Social History Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF-249)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Episode Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.41)

The value for Observation / code in a social history observation SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), or MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.18 SocialHistoryTypeCode STATIC 20061017 (CONF-243)

Observation / value can be any datatype. Where Observation / value is a physical quantity, the unit of measure SHALL be expressed using a valid Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) expression (CONF-244)
SHALL satisfy: Contains one or more sources of information (CONF-245)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1335277298"/> <code code="1213158257"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="1999607832"/> <code code="800552288"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="1528881647"/> <code code="124187280"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
